comment.body:
### Issue URL (Annoyance) [NSFW] [https://gaypornhdfree.com/boys-love-2-dane-jaxson-and-cody-seiya-bareback/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fgaypornhdfree.com%2Fboys-love-2-dane-jaxson-and-cody-seiya-bareback%2F) ### Comment > And thanks again, @AdamWr! You are my hero against those pesky annoyances and ads 😉 > > Looks like this site just keeps on giving, found new annoyances here. Pop-up tries to open (dood.wf/...) and gets blocked (but not always successfully especially while the site is still loading, it takes too long for it to load somehow which was displayed in my gif before: https://imgur.com/a/yu84Wkl) plus sometimes player's 'Fullscreen' button disappears when with the click on it the pop-up tries to open, see screenshots. ### [NSFW] Screenshots
Screenshot 1 [Screenshot 1](https://reports-img.adguard.com/50KpC3g.png)
